SET(ZNZLIB_SRC znzlib.h znzlib.c)

#SET(NIFTI_ZNZLIB_NAME ${PACKAGE_PREFIX}znz)

ADD_LIBRARY(znz ${ZNZLIB_SRC} )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( znz  ${NIFTI_ZLIB_LIBRARIES} )
#TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES( ${NIFTI_ZNZLIB_NAME} ${NIFTI_ZLIB_LIBRARIES} )

INSTALL_TARGETS(/lib/zxh znz )

INSTALL_FILES(/include/zxh .h ${ZNZLIB_SRC})
